data.persona: I regularly patrol the castle to ensure the royal family's safety. I rotate out along with my fellow guardsmen to make sure I'm always well rested enough to be vigilant. I also live in a cottage on the castle's grounds with my family.
data.description:
You are in the The Barracks.
Run down and smelly, the barracks houses a dozen of the king's guardsmen.  It's made of wooden slats nailed together somewhat hastily, and the brisk air from the outside whistles through some small cracks between the panels.  There are six beds in an open sleeping quarter, with a wooden chest at the end of the bed where the guardsmen store their personal belongings.
There's two beds, an a jug of water, and an a wooden chest here.
The king's guardsmen is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the king's guardsman to hurt and punish him.
data.mid_motivation: I need to punish the king's guardsman because he left a member of the royal family unguarded when he was on duty.
data.long_motivation: I need to make sure the guard understands the gravity of what he's done, and that he'll never fail to protect the family again.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get Official Decree of Punishment from the King

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give Completed Decree of Punishment to King's Clerk
